description: This file defines a React component 'CalendarView' for rendering calendar views (month, week, day). It includes functions to normalize event data and group events by day, and provides interactive UI elements for displaying and clicking on days and events.

methods.name: normalizeEvent(raw)
methods.description: Normalizes raw event data, extracting id, title, description, location, allDay, start, end, and raw.

methods.name: groupEventsByDay(events)
methods.description: Groups an array of events into a Map keyed by date string, sorting events within each day.

methods.name: CalendarView({ view, anchorDate, events, onDayClick, onEventClick })

ctags.name: CalendarView
ctags.pattern: /^export default function CalendarView({ view, anchorDate, events, onDayClick, onEventClick }) {$/
